name: Bowling Club: Realistic 3D

A tense bout with world-class bowling enthusiasts!

You are the right bowling champion.
Child! Adult! Bowling Club that anyone can enjoy together
Bowling Club who can enjoy anytime and anywhere without internet

**** Real-time real bowling with friends all over the world !! ****

※Features ※

1. With one finger! Or by the tilt of your phone! It provides two operations.
2. Authentic bowling to knock down 10 pins! New concept bowling that will drop 100 pins!
3. Single mode : 2 player mode with friends!
4. PvP-mode : Championship with bowling enthusiasts around the world!
5. Stage mode : Avoid obstacles and earn tremendous rewards!
6. Beach bowling,experience a variety of concept bowling alleys, including an outdoor bowling alley and a club bowling alley!

※Language : Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese,Vietnamese, Thai,Russian, Indonesian, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Turkish, French
